mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER ( VOLUNTEER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, TYPE, CATEGORY, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, ADDRESS, TOTAL_COUNT, STATUS, RECRUIT_START_DATE, RECRUIT_END_DATE, IMAGE_URL, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE ) VALUES ( SEQ_VOLUNTEER.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{category}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{address}, #{totalCount}, #{status}, #{recruitStartDate}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{imageUrl}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT VOLUNTEER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, TYPE, CATEGORY, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, ADDRESS, TOTAL_COUNT, STATUS, RECRUIT_START_DATE, RECRUIT_END_DATE, IMAGE_URL, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE VOLUNTEER_ID = #{volunteerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE VOLUNTEER SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, TYPE = #{type}, CATEGORY = #{category}, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE = #{startDate}, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE = #{endDate}, ADDRESS = #{address}, TOTAL_COUNT = #{totalCount}, STATUS = #{status}, RECRUIT_START_DATE = #{recruitStartDate}, RECRUIT_END_DATE = #{recruitEndDate}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude} WHERE VOLUNTEER_ID = #{volunteerId}
mapper.select: SELECT V.VOLUNTEER_ID AS volunteerId, V.TITLE AS title, V.TYPE AS type, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_VOLUNTEER UV WHERE UV.VOLUNTEER_ID = V.VOLUNTEER_ID) AS currentPerson FROM VOLUNTEER V

SELECT V.VOLUNTEER_ID, V.CATEGORY, V.TITLE, UI.LOGIN_ID FROM USER_VOLUNTEER UV INNER JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.VOLUNTEER_ID = UV.VOLUNTEER_ID INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.USER_ID = UV.USER_ID WHERE UV.STATUS = 0 ORDER BY V.VOLUNTEER_ID OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT V.VOLUNTEER_ID, UI.USER_ID, V.CATEGORY, V.TITLE, UI.LOGIN_ID, UI.NAME, UI.PHONE FROM USER_VOLUNTEER UV INNER JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.VOLUNTEER_ID = UV.VOLUNTEER_ID INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.USER_ID = UV.USER_ID WHERE UV.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UV.VOLUNTEER_ID = #{volunteerId}
